title: Prof.Elm
description:
"Hello, I’m the Prof.Elm, nice to meet you! 
 In this session… I will talk you… about Poketile conversions."

title: Prof.Elm
description: "Your Poketiles have 4 stats… Each one represents his power for each side."

title: Prof.Elm
description:
"When the opponent plays a Poketile with a higher stat on one of your poketile side. 
 He converts it into his own."

title: Prof.Elm
description: "But don't worry, you can do the same."

title: Prof.Elm
description: "Now, try to convert my poketiles… and win."
